post.title: Google Docs leak via OpenAI
post.excerpt: Good old ChatGPT leaks sensitive info from Google docs when some documents are loaded. The confluence of unintended consequences due to cross platform connectedness. https://www.wired.com/story/poisoned-document-could-leak-secret-data-chatgpt/?mkt_tok=MTM4LUVaTS0wNDIAAAGcJHVj3oMydZss4Y3IGesfeAKdvmXTP6L-npL2_J7eSCN2mzgh89aIJ8M-JS5PZ_Hb6XwSlXkvrfbQjrSS6bCvyBDZYx2zqLenfMjvVrDTxMzP
